sentences.en: ...the cosmetics counter of a department store.
sentences.cn: …一个百货商店的化妆品专柜。

sentences.en: A cosmetic or medicinal liquid, such as a mouthwash.
sentences.cn: 洗''.'药'.'',液体化妆品化妆用的或''.'药用'. ''的液体, 如漱口剂.

sentences.en: A new vanity dresser has a concealed Mirror and cosmetic storage area.
sentences.cn: 具备化妆功能的梳妆台,特别设计了隐藏式梳妆镜和化妆品收藏区.

sentences.en: Are you on the diet for health or cosmetic reasons?
sentences.cn: 你节食是为了健康还是为了美丽？

sentences.en: Do you know anyone who has had cosmetic surgery?
sentences.cn: 你认识做过美容手术的人 吗 ?

sentences.en: Hair Shampoo, Hair Gel Cream, Aftershave Liquid Soap, Cologne Deodorant, Cosmetic Accessories.
sentences.cn: 采购产品头发香波, 发胶奶油, 擦面液液体肥皂, 科隆防臭剂,化妆辅助部件.

sentences.en: I want to have cosmetic surgery to fix my nose.
sentences.cn: 我想去做整容手术来修正我的鼻子.

sentences.en: It is also used in cosmetic surgery, for example lip enhancement.
sentences.cn: 这也是在整容手术使用, 例如唇提高.

sentences.en: Melanie plunked her cosmetic case down on a chair.
sentences.cn: 梅拉妮把化妆盒砰的一声扔到椅子上。

sentences.en: Prefer studies cosmetic chemical, cosmetic formulation, or food additives.
sentences.cn: 专研于化妆类化工品 、 化妆品配方或食品添加剂.

sentences.en: She received a cosmetic makeover at a beauty salon as a birthday gift.
sentences.cn: 她得到了一份生日礼物，可以在美容院享受一次美容。

sentences.en: She's obviously had some sort of cosmetic surgery.
sentences.cn: 她显然做过某种美容术.

sentences.en: The kit consisted of about twenty cosmetic items.
sentences.cn: 整套工具包括大约20种化妆用品。

sentences.en: These black models are moving in on what was previously white territory: the lucrative cosmetic contracts.
sentences.cn: 黑人模特正逐步涉足曾是白人主宰的领地：签约获利丰厚的化妆品行业。
这些改变纯粹是装饰门面.

sentences.en: What do you think of cosmetic surgery?
sentences.cn: 你对美容手术有什么看法?

sentences.en: Would you ever consider having cosmetic surgery?
sentences.cn: 你会考虑做美容手术 吗 ?

trans.tran_en: intended to make your hair, skin, body etc look more attractive
Cosmetics are substances such as lipstick or powder, which people put on their face to make themselves look more attractive
